item.title: Hello World | Blog opening ;-)
item.description: Original mission The main reason I started this blog is i want to share some some experience on life and study;-) Nice to meet you~ 2022.6.12(early morning)= =, I can’t sleep, let me finish this…. 2022.6.13 2:00 a.m.: I found hugo-theme-stack theme and it looks really nice, so i use hugo instead of hexo My situation After June 20th, my high school entrance examination is completely over, and I will start to take care of this blog.
